text:
Leukemia
What is the outlook for Juvenile Myelomonocytic Leukemia ?,Certain factors affect prognosis (chance of recovery) and treatment options. The prognosis (chance of recovery) and treatment options for JMML depend on the following:         - The age of the child at diagnosis.    - The number of platelets in the blood.    - The amount of a certain type of hemoglobin in red blood cells.,CancerGov,Juvenile Myelomonocytic Leukemia
What are the treatments for Juvenile Myelomonocytic Leukemia ?,"
